Desc.entry: Provides NHS health care to any Sheffield resident through a standard GP practice and a walk-in clinic. Patients can register with the health centre but unregistered patients can also attend. Registered patients can book appointments or call in without an appointment. Non-registered patients cannot book appointments but may attend without an appointment. Services offered include: GP and nurse practitioner consultations, contraception and sexual health, travel health, asthma, diabetes, flu vaccinations, smoking cessation, childhood immunisations, ear syringing, cholesterol testing and medicals. Private clinic for holiday vaccinations is available for non-registered patients. Non-registered patients are advised to call ahead to discuss the availability of services.
